title: Ruby Radiance: Rose Gold Kundan Bracelet
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and durability.
features: This contemporary bracelet features a circular Kundan setting. A vibrant ruby is centrally set and surrounded by brilliant CZ stones. The open-shank design, crafted in elegant rose gold, adds a modern touch to traditional Indian jewelry. The rose gold is crafted with sleek lines and pave-set with cubic zirconia for a luxurious gleam.
occasions: or to add a touch of elegance to everyday wear. It can also be worn at pre-wedding events like sangeet
description: This bracelet offers the perfect blend of traditional Kundan craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. The AAA-grade Ruby radiates luxuriousness and signifies prosperity. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and superior durability. A versatile piece that can be paired with both traditional and contemporary outfits.
